revised_title: Evolution and Morphology of Anomiacea Mollusks: Pododesmus, Anomia, Patro, Enigmonia, Placunanomia, and Placuna
tldr: This article provides a comprehensive survey of the Anomiacea superfamily, focusing on the evolution and morphology of its various genera, including Pododesmus, Anomia, Patro, Enigmonia, Placunanomia, and Placuna. The study traces the evolution of this specialized superfamily through different stages, highlighting the unique characteristics and adaptations of each genus.
